editions.table_of_contents: Part I: History of the Legal-Tender Acts -- The Suspension of Specie Payments -- The First Legal-Tender Act -- The Second Legal-Tender Act -- The Third Legal-Tender Act -- How Further Issues of Greebacks Were Avoided in 1864 and 1865 -- Part II: Economic Consequences of the Legal Tender Acts -- Preliminary Sketch -- The Circulating Medium -- The Specie Value of the Paper Currency -- Prices -- Wages -- Rent -- Interest and Loan Capital -- Profits -- The Production and Consumption of Wealth -- The Greenbacks and the Cost of the Civil War.
